kpi.name: M1001C701

kpi_info.title: RAB ACCESS COMPLETE CS AMR + PS NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB access completed for a multi-RAB combination ""CS AMR +1PS NRT"". UPDATED: This counter is updated when the RNC receives a setup complete message from the UE, indicating that the Multi-RAB combination in question is successfully established, and sends a response message to CN indicating that the RAB is successfully established. This is the case when a PS/CS RAB already exists and a CS/PS RAB is set up in addition to it (for the same RRC connection).

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB ACCESS COMPLETE CS AMR + PS NRT
